generated_body: The article titled "Hey, Millennials, look out below! Gen Z may already be catching up in the salary race" is likely to discuss the evolving dynamics of salary trends between Millennials and Generation Z. Readers can expect to find statistical comparisons and analysis of the earning potential of these two age groups, highlighting factors such as educational attainment, job market entry, and industry shifts.
